name: Mine Mishap! A Frontier Scum Roll table
name_original: Mine Mishap! A Frontier Scum Roll table
description:
Have your Scvum really done it now? whether it be accidently lighting a stick of dynamite mistaken for a candle, or breathing in the noxious fumes that seep from the dirty coal walls, Mine Mishap has you covered to explain how your Scvum meet there end deep underground!

FRONTIER SCUM is copyright Den of Druids.

Miner Mishap is an independent production by TheDoctor989 and is not affiliated with Den of Druids. It is published under the FRONTIER SCUM Third-Party License.
